import{atom}from'recoil';export var endpointState=atom({key:'endpointState',default:{urlEndpoint:'https://api.clickcompanyapp.com.br',urlEndpointEstados:'https://servicodados.ibge.gov.br/api/v1/localidades/estados/'}});export var fluxoCreatePerfil=atom({key:'fluxoCreatePerfil',default:{finalSendTo:'/perfil-companion'}});export var typeCreatePerfil=atom({key:'typeCreatePerfil',default:{typePerfil:'acompanhante'}});export var selectedPlan=atom({key:'selectedPlan',default:{idPlan:0,pricePlan:0,descriptionPlan:'',typePlan:'',timePlan:0}});export var successfulBuy=atom({key:'successfulBuy',default:{mensage:"",referenceId:"",status:""}});export var fotosKyc=atom({key:'fotosKyc',default:{documentFront:null,documentBack:null,documentSelfie:null,documentFrontTemporaryUrl:'',documentBackTemporaryUrl:'',documentSelfieTemporaryUrl:''}});export var createPerfilAcompanhante1=atom({key:'fotosKyc',default:{name:'',profile:{nickname:'',whatsApp:'',gender:'',height:'',eyes:'',// Id
